items.content_html: A sleek and modern developer portfolio built with React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/UI, designed to showcase skills, projects, and experience in an optimized and responsive layout. This portfolio is fast and lightweight, powered by Vite for optimal performance, and features a customizable UI styled with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/UI.

items.content_html: A lightweight, serverless image processing tool built with AWS Lambda and Sharp. It automatically resizes images uploaded to an S3 bucket and saves the optimized output to a destination bucket—scalable, efficient, and fully cloud-native.
items.title: dlauck92/lambda-image-resizer: A lightweight, serverless image processing tool built with AWS Lambda and Sharp. It automatically resizes images uploaded to an S3 bucket and saves the optimized output to a destination bucket—scalable, efficient, and fully cloud-native.

items.content_html: HodlEye is a lightweight crypto price tracker with real-time updates, unlimited alarms, Binance & OKX support, crypto news, economic calendar, and a built-in portfolio tracker — all in a clean, Docker-based web app for hodlers and active traders.

items.content_html: IronCloak is a lightweight password manager focused on simplicity and security. It encrypts your credentials and stores them securely in a MongoDB database. Built for reliability without unnecessary features, IronCloak ensures your passwords are safe and accessible only to you.
items.title: rohitghosh1763/IronCloak-AES-256: IronCloak is a lightweight password manager focused on simplicity and security. It encrypts your credentials and stores them securely in a MongoDB database. Built for reliability without unnecessary features, IronCloak ensures your passwords are safe and accessible only to you.
